verses.verse: I <S%G1263>solemnly<s%> <S%G1263>charge<s%> [you] in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> who is to <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> and the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and by His <S%G2015>appearing<s%> and His kingdom: <S%G932><s%>

<S%G2784>preach<s%> the <S%G3056>word;<s%> be <S%G2186>ready<s%> in <S%G2122>season<s%> [and] out of <S%G171>season;<s%> <S%G1651>reprove,<s%> <S%G2008>rebuke,<s%> <S%G3870>exhort,<s%> with <S%G3956>great<s%> <S%G3115>patience<s%> and <S%G1322>instruction.<s%>

For the <S%G2540>time<s%> will <S%G1510>come<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they will not <S%G430>endure<s%> <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine;<s%> but [wanting] to have their <S%G189>ears<s%> <S%G2833>tickled,<s%> they will <S%G2002>accumulate<s%> for <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1320>teachers<s%> in <S%G2596>accordance<s%> to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1939>desires;<s%>
and will <S%G654>turn<s%> <S%G654>away<s%> their <S%G189>ears<s%> from the <S%G225>truth,<s%> and will <S%G1624>turn<s%> <S%G1624>aside<s%> to <S%G3454>myths.<s%>

But you, be <S%G3525>sober<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G2553>endure<s%> <S%G2553>hardship,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of an <S%G2099>evangelist,<s%> <S%G4135>fulfill<s%> your <S%G1248>ministry.<s%>
For I am <S%G2235>already<s%> being <S%G4689>poured<s%> out as a <S%G4689>drink<s%> <S%G4689>offering,<s%> and the <S%G2540>time<s%> of my <S%G359>departure<s%> has <S%G2186>come.<s%>
I have <S%G75>fought<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G73>fight,<s%> I have <S%G5055>finished<s%> the <S%G1408>course,<s%> I have <S%G5083>kept<s%> the <S%G4102>faith;<s%>

in the <S%G3062>future<s%> there is <S%G606>laid<s%> up for me the <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G2923>Judge,<s%> will <S%G591>award<s%> to me on that <S%G2250>day;<s%> and not <S%G3440>only<s%> to me, but <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> who have <S%G25>loved<s%> His <S%G2015>appearing.<s%>
<S%G4704>Make<s%> <S%G4704>every<s%> <S%G4704>effort<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to me <S%G5030>soon;<s%>

for <S%G1214>Demas,<s%> having <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> has <S%G1459>deserted<s%> me and <S%G4198>gone<s%> to <S%G2332>Thessalonica;<s%> <S%G2913>Crescens<s%> [has gone] to <S%G1053>Galatia,<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> to <S%G1149>Dalmatia.<s%>
<S%G3441>Only<s%> <S%G3065>Luke<s%> is with me. <S%G353>Pick<s%> up <S%G3138>Mark<s%> and <S%G71>bring<s%> him with you, for he is <S%G2173>useful<s%> to me for <S%G1248>service.<s%>
But <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%> I have <S%G649>sent<s%> to <S%G2181>Ephesus.<s%>

When you <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5342>bring<s%> the <S%G5315>cloak<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G620>left<s%> at <S%G5174>Troas<s%> with <S%G2591>Carpus,<s%> and the <S%G975>books,<s%> <S%G3122>especially<s%> the <S%G3200>parchments.<s%>

<S%G223>Alexander<s%> the <S%G5471>coppersmith<s%> <S%G1731>did<s%> me <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2556>harm;<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will <S%G591>repay<s%> him <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G2041>deeds.<s%>
Be on <S%G5442>guard<s%> against him <S%G4771>yourself,<s%> for he <S%G3029>vigorously<s%> <S%G436>opposed<s%> our <S%G3056>teaching.<s%>

At my <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G627>defense<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G3854>supported<s%> me, but <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1459>deserted<s%> me; may it not be <S%G3049>counted<s%> against them.

But the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3936>stood<s%> with me, and <S%G1743>strengthened<s%> me, in <S%G2443>order<s%> that <S%G1223>through<s%> me the <S%G2782>proclamation<s%> might be <S%G4135>fully<s%> <S%G4135>accomplished,<s%> and that <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> might <S%G191>hear;<s%> and I was <S%G4506>delivered<s%> out of the lion's <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will <S%G4506>deliver<s%> me from <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2041>deed,<s%> and will <S%G4982>bring<s%> me <S%G4982>safely<s%> to His <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G932>kingdom;<s%> to Him [be] the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G4251>Prisca<s%> and <S%G207>Aquila,<s%> and the <S%G3624>household<s%> of <S%G3683>Onesiphorus.<s%>
<S%G2037>Erastus<s%> <S%G3306>remained<s%> at <S%G2882>Corinth,<s%> but <S%G5161>Trophimus<s%> I <S%G620>left<s%> <S%G770>sick<s%> at <S%G3399>Miletus.<s%>

<S%G4704>Make<s%> <S%G4704>every<s%> <S%G4704>effort<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G5494>winter.<s%> <S%G2103>Eubulus<s%> <S%G782>greets<s%> you, <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4227>Pudens<s%> and <S%G3044>Linus<s%> and <S%G2803>Claudia<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G80>brethren.<s%>
The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> be with your <S%G4151>spirit.<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be with you.
